name: DyeColorHelper
description: DyeColorHelper is a utility class that provides access to Minecraft dye color properties and variations. It wraps the native DyeColor enum and allows you to query various color representations including names, RGB values, and context-specific color variations used in different game elements like fireworks and signs.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Gets the localized name of this dye color

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Gets the unique ID for this dye color in the dye color enum

methods.name: getColorValue
methods.description: Gets the primary RGB color value used for entities and general rendering

methods.name: getFireworkColor
methods.description: Gets the specific RGB value used when this color appears in fireworks

methods.name: getSignColor
methods.description: Gets the specific RGB value used when this color appears on text signs
